value.name: Readers share nostalgic memories of witnessing first Indians game. What's yours? | Jeff Schudel
value.description: We were sitting on the first base side probably about 10 rows behind the dugout. Super Joe (Charboneau) was walking by in between the dugout and the first base line. I said, "Hey, it's Super Joe!”

value.name: Lookouts Who Made It "Big In The Bigs"
value.description: Kid Elberfield in the infield and any Lookouts team must include outfielder Joe Charboneau (OF) who was 1980 A.L. Rookie of the Year with Cleveland. Managing this guys is in good hands with Cal ...

value.name: Roy Exum: Mark’s 50th Anniversary Toast
value.description: Predictably, it is a treasure and there is even a picture of former Lookout Joe Charboneau gracing the cover. But the “editor” in me came out when I demanded to know why Mark omitted the ...
